sentences.en: Camping plunged confidently into biblical numerology: God revealed to Noah in the year 4990 BC that there would be yet 7 days until the flood of waters would be upon the earth.
sentences.cn: 康屏自信满满地让自己沉浸在圣经的数字命理学中：公元前4990年上帝启示诺亚说还有7天时间洪水就要淹没大地了。

sentences.en: Empiricism and quantitative tradition of educational research: constructing the numerology of scientific methodologies.
sentences.cn: 经验主义与教育研究的量化传统: 建构科学方法论的数字学.

sentences.en: In general, his theories are based on the followings: ancient mathematics, geometry, numerology and astrology.
sentences.cn: 大体而言, 他的理论基于以下几种学科: 古代数学 、 几何学 、 占数学和占星学.

sentences.en: Part superstition and part self - fulfilling prophecy , numerology is a basic trading strategy in China.
sentences.cn: 部分迷信,部分 自我 感觉,数字学成为中国股民的基本交易策略.

sentences.en: Still, Professor Carlson does concede there are two significant aspects about 11/11/11 that can be construed as lucky even by people like him who don't believe in numerology.
sentences.cn: 但卡尔森教授仍然勉强同意，甚至像他这样不相信数字命理学的人也得承认，这一天有两个可以称之为幸运的因素。

words.tran_cn: 数值的；数字的；用数字表示的（等于numeric）
计算；数字的读法；[数] 命数法；编号

trans.tran_cn: 数字命理学，数字占卦术
trans.tran_en: Numerology is the study of particular numbers, such as a person's date of birth, in the belief that they may have special significance in a person's life
